text: Arnold Stone (11 March 1910 - 24 June 2004) was a Canadian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1932 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Canadian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Canada Category:Ski jumpers at the 1932 Winter Olympics Category:People from Revelstoke, British Columbia Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia
title: Arnold Stone
